QuestData.Title: Pie for Billy
QuestData.Description: Maybe if I got a pie, I could tell you who has that necklace. And you know, I think that old Bernice lady at that other farm makes great Pork Belly Pies... $B$BMaybe if you gave her some tender boar meat from the boars that hang around our farms, and told her what it was for, she'd bake up a pie for you.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring 4 Tender Boar Meat to Auntie Bernice Stonefield at the Stonefield's Farm.
QuestData.CompletionText: I don't think it's right feeding the boy who stole my necklace in the first place, but if that's what it takes to get back what's mine, then so be it!$B$BDo you have that boar meat?
QuestData.RewardText: Though this wild boar meat is bland, simmer it enough in the right spices and it sure does make for some tasty pie!
